about.aboutContent:
UPDATES


February 2024 release includes WFRC final forecasts and MAG draft forecasts using the v9.0.1 TDM.

The November 2021 release includes WFRC/MAG forecasts using the v8.3.2 TDM.
Link to Previous Release (November 2021)

Other areas of the state were last updated December 2020.
Link to Previous Release (December 2020)

IMPORTANT


This data is for informational purposes and must be field verified prior to being used on a project.

Please direct questions to:

Suzie Swim, WFRC
sswim@wfrc.org

Tim Hereth, MAG
thereth@mountainland.org

Natalia Brown, UDOT
nataliabrown@utah.gov

ADJUSTMENT FACTORS


The volumes in this map are Annual Average Daily Traffic. To obtain weekday or seasonal adjustment factors, please visit the CCS Factors Map.
